name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Syracuse

reviews.text: Every quarter when i go to Syracuse on business, I always stay at the Doubletree. Its very convenient, right off the interstate and close to a variety of restaurants. Nice reception (Champagne and Strawberries a plus), the check in is convenient as well. The gym is modern and two nice pools (in and out). The rooms are always very clean.
reviews.title: Great Business Hotel - Very Clean-Nice Gym!

reviews.text: Check in was fast & smooth, room was ready, clean and quiet, & the staff were all friendly and courteous. Didn't get achance to use the facilities but the indoor & outdoor pool both looked great.
reviews.title: Nice clean hotel! Very friendly staff!

reviews.text: My husband, son & I stayed at the Double Tree Hotel while visiting Syracuse University.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - close to Syracuse University!

reviews.text: Wished we could of stayed longer to take advantage of the indoor/outdoor pools and the restaurant/bar. Would highly recommend the "Double Tree" and the "Dinosaur Barbeque" (great food) while visiting Syracuse, NY.
reviews.title: As a first-timer it was very good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First night at this property was very good. Rooms are fine. Hotel was quiet for a large property (7 stories and spread out). Restaurant was good for dinner and breakfast. Many channels on flat-screen TV. Friendly staff. There are many choices in the Carrier Circle area and this is a recommended full-service hotel.
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.text: Excellent rate online. I've stayed here numerous times and never had any issues. Large hotel with plenty of free parking. Always easy check-in. Professional and courteous staff. Nice, comfy, clean rooms with great beds. Great workout area. Very nice indoor and outdoor pools. There is a bar/restaurant in the lobby but I've never had the pleasure of eating there. I always enjoy staying here and highly recommend.
reviews.title: Always great!

reviews.text: The DoubleTree Hotel (East) Syracuse, New York is conveniently located off exit 35 of the New York State Thruway. The hotel, just off the Carrier Circle, is a great location for business travelers and/or those who attend the NYS Fair each summer. The place is clean, comfortable and very accommodating. A managers’ reception is provided in the hotel’s lobby Monday-Thursday afternoon; champagne, fruit, cheese & crackers, soft drinks, and freshly made kettle cooked chips. And of course, the DoubleTree’s famous chocolate chip cookies are provided each guest upon check in!
reviews.title: Great Hotel in East Syracuse!

reviews.text: The entire first floor has just been renovated; banquet rooms, meeting spaces and public areas. In very tasteful colors of gray, deep purple and black, the DoubleTree has taken on a more sophisticated and relaxed look and feel. The guest rooms could use a face-lift as their furnishings and carpets are starting to show their age. However, guest rooms are clean and the beds are extremely comfortable.
reviews.title: Perfect business hotel.

reviews.text: There are two swimming pools (one in and one outdoors) and a well equipped workout room. Parking is plentiful and free. Food in their restaurant is very good; not fine dining, but very good just the same.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Every time I stay at this DoubleTree ( and I stay here often) , I find the staff to be very friendly, helpful and most accommodating. All-in-all, a good stay while passing through the Syracuse area.
reviews.title: Very well managed Hilton Chain hotel.

reviews.text: Beautiful hotel. Exceptionally clean. Beds were so comfortable. Indoor and outdoor pool. We couldn't believe how nice it was for the rate.
reviews.title: Great for a family wedding

reviews.text: Daily brunch was delicious and the restaurant had the most delicious pot roast. The wedding in the ballroom for 175 was outstanding -- service and food was top rate.
reviews.title: A decent option in the Syracuse area

reviews.text: Management should be very proud of the staff.
reviews.title: Fresh and clean, great choice

reviews.text: When I stay in Syracuse, I normally stay at the HGI. However, since this was a late booking, the DoubleTree ended up offering the best price of the Hilton Family of hotels in the area.
reviews.title: Small shortcomings overcome by friendly, diligent staff and service

reviews.text: It was nice to be greeted with the signature chocolate chip cookie, however, it was a disappointment for me because they are actually chocolate chip and walnut cookies.
reviews.title: Clean, Comfortable, Nice Pool

reviews.text: I grew up in Syracuse and now live in Orlando. This hotel is in a great location, easy enough to find, and close to everything that a girl would want. ( Mostly shopping). My 2 1/2 yr old nephew loved the pool and it was great that they have an indoor and an outdoor pool. Room service was a little expensive but the food was great and the room service attendant ( Michelle I think) was beyond freindly. Check in was amazing also, the woman at the front desk (ola?) exrtemely nice and answered any and all questions I had. I would certainly stay here again and so would the rest of my family!!!!
reviews.title: Amazing Stay!!!

reviews.text: After a 7 hour drive, we arrived in the evening to check in to the Doubletree with a reservation we made previously. We were given a room which, when we arrived at the door, we could not get into. Despite several attempts with our key card, it appeared the door was locked from the inside. We dragged our bags back to the front desk where we were told that this happens at times and they would send an engineer to open the door. We dragged our bags all the way back to the room. No engineer. 5 minutes passed. We were tired and not happy campers. We went back to the front desk to complain. Instead of an apology and a new room, we were told we should go back and wait some more.
reviews.title: It was all downhill after the warm cookie...

reviews.text: While a manager did come to check on us, the whole situation was not conducive to making our stay a pleasant one.
reviews.title: Great In house Restaurant

reviews.text: Once we did get into a room, a new one that we demanded, finally, we found the carpeting damp, hair on the toilet seat, and other issues. The bed was not as comfortable as lesser value hotels we've stayed in recently. We were very disappointed, indeed.
reviews.title: Good stop-over on our way to Niagara Falls

reviews.text: We chose the Doubletree because it is a higher end hotel that we felt we could rely on to be clean and comfortable after a long drive with our children. If only that were true.
reviews.title: An OK stay, better soundproofing and would have been A+

description: Our full-service hotel in Syracuse, New York, is situated in a corporate park just off the New York State Thruway and is only ten minutes from downtown and Syracuse University. Take the complimentary shuttle to Syracuse Hancock International Airport.Our rooms and suites offer modern decor with complimentary WiFi throughout. Relax in the courtyard area with seating, plus enjoy the heated, indoor pool with a whirlpool spa and the heated, outdoor pool with a sundeck. Dine at Regatta Bar & Grille, offering cocktails and light food. Our hotel in Syracuse, New York also offers room service, a complimentary 24-hour fitness center, complimentary 24-hour business center and a self-service pantry. Host a meeting in 12,000 sq. ft. of event space including two ballrooms and two boardrooms capable of hosting up to 500 people.
